Village Green: Made by Milk Link Cheese (now part of ARLA Foods) at their Reece's Creamery in Malpas, Cheshire
Village Green is a cheddar style cheese
Its name reflects the green wax coating applied to every cheese
Sold at various ages between 3 months and 18 months
it has a brilliant white colour
and sweet nutty flavour that becomes more pronounced as it ages.
If you thought you didn't like goat's cheese then this is the one that might change your mind!
